item.description:
Let's celebrate the New Year at a RAW Potluck.

If you are interested, please email me at suecomeau@comcast.net for directions.

6:30PM-8:30pm

Love to see you,

Warmest Regards,  Sue Comeau

 

This list of raw food sources has been prepared to help you have plenty of variety at home and to have ideas of dishes to bring to raw pot luck events:

 

1. you could bring an organic salad;

2. there is a source for raw recipes listed in the invitation at http://www.rawnewenglandcommunity.com ;

3. there are plenty of raw recipes available online

http://www.living-foods.com/recipes

http://goneraw.com

http://www.rawsacramento.net/recipes.htm

http://www.shazzie.com/raw/recipes

http://www.healthfree.com/raw_food_recipes.html

http://www.rawganique.com/recipes.htm 

http://www.giveittomeraw.com/forum/categories/recipes-1/listForCategory

http://www.livinghiho.com/recipes ;

4. most raw food books have raw recipes; and

5. organic fruit or fruit salad.

------------------------------------------------
item.how_to_find_us: This meeting is in a Private Home, please email me for directions at suecomeau@comcast.net
item.name: RAW Vegan Potluck - Boxford, MA, Thursday, Jan. 5th, 2012 at 6:30 PM
